channel.title: Wtf? Windows 7 64 bit run server problem
channel.description:
Well on all the freaking run.bat's in the server files i get this error:
@echo off title ragingscape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
My compiler works, but not "Run Server" Any help?? When i double click run server box comes up and goes away.."Java not found" or whatever.
(I am running Windows 7 Ultimate 64 bit)

item.title: Wtf? Windows 7 64 bit run server problem
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Ok so you weren’t kidding…

Explicitly tell it where java is located, I.E.:

“c:/Program_files/blah blah blah bullshit blah/java.exe”

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf? Windows 7 64 bit run server problem

item.title: Wtf? Windows 7 64 bit run server problem
item.dc:creator: @sorakbm sorakbm
item.description:
@sorakbm wrote:

Adam:

Put pause at the end of the batch file. Then copy and paste what it says, here.

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? Windows 7 64 bit run server problem

item.description:
@sorakbm wrote:

Well on all the freaking run.bat’s in the server files i get this error:

@echo off
title ragingscape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

My compiler works, but not “Run Server” Any help?? When i double click run server box comes up and goes away…“Java not found” or whatever.

(I am running Windows 7 Ultimate 64 bit)
